ygData.subject: RE: Shin Gauntlets and Greaves
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmmm, those Shin Knights and sha s are not live froggies.  I do believe that they are considered dead froggie and that s they don t agro you when you have
ygData.messageBody:
Hmmm, those Shin Knights and sha's are not live froggies. I do believe that
they are considered dead froggie and that's they don't agro you when you
have invis to undead. But my froggy faction is real bad. Everything agros
me unless its too green.

In my zone <g>, you go down that hall and come to the T. To the right is
the hall to the water where you swim to the right again to get to the
underwater tunnel to the bedroom. To the left is the hall to the slime then
the 'round room' or back room with the 3 spawn. out of that room is a
spiral staircase to where the necro wand drops on the floor and the
waterfall. I guess that there is a zone out from the waterfall to the upper
guk. If you swim the wrong way from the bedroom, I do believe there is an
underwater zone to the water by the ancient croc on the upper side.

Also, if you have wrecked your precious live froggie faction by killing one
or two, I am told you can get it back by hanging around the ppl fighting the
shin frogs and playing heal song (I guess you got to group unless you just
want to count on the faction bug to get your factions back.) I guess you
could bop them one time and hope the other guy kills em. Dead froggies
don't like live froggies? Hmmm.

I have been trying to work the hall trash and back room for xp. Don't think
I can solo a froggie yet. With a partner we can handle 2 froggies.
Sometimes we get in too deep when we pull 3 - but the zone is near by.

Sylly


-----Original Message-----
From: Kimes, Dean W. [mailto:Dean_Kimes@...]
Sent: Tuesday, November 30, 1999 2:17 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Shin Gauntlets and Greaves

From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>

Yep that's the one. If you go down that first ramp once in
Lower Guk there
are live froggies at the bottom in the t-intersection. If
you go right you
go dead side and waterfall, if you go left more live
froggies. The
T-intersection is kinda the crossover point between dead and
live froggies,
you can find both greaves and gauntlets within easy fleeing
distance of the
zone there.

Kitasi

-----Original Message-----
From: James Schuldes [mailto:jgs@...]
Sent: Tuesday, November 30, 1999 1:15 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Shin Gauntlets and Greaves


From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>

That does not sound like the same one I use. I would say
stay to the far
right side of Upper Guk. Go into the water like you are
going to the heart
spider rooms. Past them, thru the hot tub room, thru the
room with the
square columns. Keep holding to the right hand side - down
the halls. Cross
the bridge with the spiders and don't fall in - real pain
finding the ladder
to get out. Thru the slime hall and soon there will be a
hall to the right
and a torch pot and the zone to the dead side of lower. If
there are a
bunch of high levels sitting around healing, you know a
train just came
thru. When they go back in, you will prolly find some ded
froggies with
greaves and gaunts. If some one shouts train, get moving to
the zone.

Sylly


-----Original Message-----
From: Kimes, Dean W.
[mailto:Dean_Kimes@...]
Sent: Monday, November 29, 1999 3:56 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Shin Gauntlets
and Greaves

From: "Kimes, Dean W."
<Dean_Kimes@...>

The entrance that drops you at the
crossroads between live
side and dead
side above the waterfall.

Kitasi

-----Original Message-----
From: edwardscanni
[mailto:edwardscanni@...]
Sent: Monday, November 29, 1999 2:53 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Shin Gauntlets and
Greaves


From: "edwardscanni"
<edwardscanni@...>

Uldar, I have a map of Guk-but which
entrance to lower do
you go for the
greaves and gloves?
Scanna Swiftsinger
-----Original Message-----
From: jasroc@... <jasroc@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com
<eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Monday, November 29, 1999 4:42 PM
Subject: [eqbards] Shin Gauntlets and
Greaves


>From: jasroc@...
>
>
>So, My advice to young bards, Get a map,
enter Guk, go
invis, trot down to
Lower Guk and wait. I could have looted 2
more gloves and
greaves from
corpses at the exit. Plus, even if you can't
complete the
quests just yet,
the gloves(AC 7,+5poison Wt5) and greaves(AC
10,+5disease,Wt7.7) are nice
(plus they look cool).
>
>Uldar Ulfangson
>32nd Bard, Rodcet Nife
>
